name: Space Coast - Toast to Toast
description:
This short, simple multiplayer game was the result of a 2.5 day student game jam at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment, Melbourne. Focusing on a Vaporwave aesthetic, the game mimics the trademark look of Vaporwave and an old Windows computer game.

CONTROLS

Use Mouse to click "Play", and "Exit". Please note that gameplay is Xbox Controller only.

A to Jump

B to Shoot

Player wins when opponent dies 3 times!

Use keyboard to exit the game by pressing Alt-F4.
